name: Shark Attack (itch) (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Greg Duddle - Mr. Micro Ltd / Firebird. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

The seas of the world are no longer safe! Giant, man eating sharks now rule the waves, and the only hope left is for fearless divers to brave the rigours of the undersea world and destroy the shark menace. Not only will kill you have to brave the sharks, but also vicious and hungry squid, electric eels, and octopii.

Sharks threaten bathers across 12 seas, please clear all 12 locations. Good luck!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: A or B
LEFT / RIGHT: Cursor keys
Fire: A or B

Start the game: Z or X
LEFT / RIGHT: Arrow keys
Fire: Z or X

Plus 4 World
